reviews.text:
only come to this sch if you want to get bullied all i have to say for this sch is that they do not know how to manage bullying and certain people have been bullied multiple times and have made multiple reports but the sch isn‚Äôt taking actions
all they do is talk to the students and try to make them forgive each other which have zero  impact on the students behaviour. This sch is the worst sch i‚Äôve been in absolutely trash.

Im gonna start off with the bad points(theres only one)
I love the teachers in Efss but some of them cant teach(Neo chee keong) if u get him as ur chem teacher gg to your grades this man never even upload the slides for our chapter on google classroom yet(he said he would upload like 4 chem lessons agoüò≠ )and istg he is the only reason i hate this school so much.Almost the whole class failed chem EOY in sec 3 and now its sec 4 he still cant teach idk what to do i dont even have tuition and even if u ask him question he will reply as if he is scolding you and the way he replies makes no sense at all 0/10 teachers other than that i ‚ù§Ô∏è this school.
statically the best secondary school in punggol, visited for an event once and was quite impressive

5 stars cz of the seniors, -1 cuz there is no haikaveh content (also if you plan on making one please give Alhaitham a tan I can't handle staring at him without blinding myself) anyways W school will probably be going here once I graduate primary school - Art in the photo done by ggelus_ on Instagram üëçüëç
